text: Covert Action (originally released as Sono Stato un Agente C.I.A.) is a 1978 Italian/Greek co-production Eurospy film starring the American actor David Janssen. The plot was based on the experiences of former CIA agent Philip Ageehttp://www.blythe.org/nytransfer-subs/Media/Say_Whatever_You_Like who initiated a lawsuit with the producers over his fees and expenses.Agee, Philip On the Run L. Stuart, 1987 ==Plot== A former CIA agent decides to write about his CIA career that leads him into danger. ==Production== The original female lead Catherine Bach dropped out and was replaced with Corinne Cléry. Due to a then new Italian ordinance that prohibited the firing of firearms in Italian movies, gunfire scenes were filmed in Greece.http://www.davidjanssen.net/chron17.htm ==Cast== *David Janssen ...
